title: Simulation Game-Based Education for Oral Lesion Diagnosis and Treatment Planning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of oral anatomy and general pathology
context.additional_context: Learners (corporate health educators or medical device sales trainees) aiming to strengthen competencies through real clinical case-based simulations

learning_goals: Learners can identify key symptoms and characteristics of oral lesions with 80% accuracy through simulation games.
Learners can successfully create appropriate testing plans three times consecutively using diagnostic tools provided in the game.
Learners can distinguish and present at least four types of treatment approaches tailored to patient characteristics in a simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
